eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.impl

Class CheckedDataStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.impl.CheckedDataStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdvanceDataStore

    public class CheckedDataStore
extends Object
implements AdvanceDataStore
    A datastore wrapper which checks at each query whether the user is allowed to perform that operation.

    Whenever an updateXYZ() method is called, the class replaces the modifiedBy field with the user name.

    Author:
    karnokd, 2011.09.29.
